attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If a person works for a company for less than a year many companies will feel free to dismiss staff and not even need to give a valid reason as they know legally the employee has no rights. I feel an employee should have rights regarding their security in their job within their 1st year. 
I left a secure job to start a new one, but within a few months found myself unemployed because my new company hit financial difficulties & know many people this has happened to.Currently new employees have no protection or rights.
